attributes.action: Stop Buggies and Prams going on edinburgh buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The primary reason for this petition is to ensure wheelchair users have their rightful space on edinburgh LRT buses. This is an ongoing concern as can be seen from the recent coverage in the edinburgh evening news.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
